message:
I tried the example with a simple console app, using a single class that mirrors the example. but could not get it to deadlock. Tried different async scenarios to make sure the static async method actually yielded control.   
The console app does not create any threads so it should be a one-thread-at-a-time SynchronizationContext.   
(I can post the code example on stackexchange).
